message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_NO_CRITERIA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_APPLICATION_PROGRAM_STATUS
message.locale: If 'Application Status' = 'Disposed', 'Program Status' cannot be Pending.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_NO_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: You must specify an application reference number.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_NO_APPLICATION_REFERENCE_MATCH
message.locale: The application reference number does not exist.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_NO_APPLICATION_CASE_REFERENCE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Reference Number entered does not match client name.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_NO_MATCH
message.locale: No application could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No application search implemented. Please contact an administrator.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_MAXIMUM
message.locale: The maximum number of search results has been exceeded. Please refine your search.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_USER_CREATED_NO_APPLICATIONS
message.locale: The current user has not created any applications.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEAPPLICATIONSEARCH_STRING_DAYS
message.locale: days

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_APPLICATION_TYPE_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: An application type must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_PROGRAMS_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one program must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_CLIENT_NONE_SELECTED
message.locale: A person must be selected in the search results to continue.

message.name: INF_APPLICATION_PDF
message.locale: Application PDF

message.name: ERR_INPROGRESS_APPPLICATION_ASSIGNMENT
message.locale: An in-process application cannot be re-assigned.

message.name: ERR_APPPLICATION_ALREADY_ASSIGNED_TO_YOU
message.locale: The application is already currently assigned to you.

message.name: APPLICATION_PDF_NAME
message.locale: _Application.pdf

message.name: ERR_SELECT_FV_CLIENT_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_WITH_APPLICATION
message.locale: This client is already associated with the application

message.name: ERR_SELECT_AN_OPTION_TO_CONTINUE
message.locale: An option must be selected to continue.

message.name: ERR_DEFERRED_SUBMISSION_ERROR
message.locale: An error has occurred during the deferred submission of Application %1s. Application ID: %2n Deferred Process ID: %3n

message.name: ONLINE_PROGRAM_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_CLIENT_NAME
message.locale: Client

message.name: INF_DUPLICATE_ALTERNATE_ID_NOTE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Duplicate person identification number must be resolved.

message.name: INF_DUPLICATE_ALTERNATE_ID_NOTE_TEXT
message.locale: The person identification number %1s submitted on this application already exists on the system for a different person. Please contact the applicant to resolve the issue.

message.name: INF_DUPLICATE_ALTERNATE_ID_NOTE_TEXT_WITH_APPLICATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: The person identification number %1s submitted on Application %2s already exists on the system for a different person. Please contact the applicant to resolve the issue.
